title: Bobby's 30 Minute Coffee Date + Best Romantic Movie Draft + Bobby’s Mailbag: NOT Changing Last Name After Getting Married
itunes:title: Bobby's 30 Minute Coffee Date + Best Romantic Movie Draft + Bobby’s Mailbag: NOT Changing Last Name After Getting Married
description:
Amy asks Bobby about his coffee date yesterday. He reveals it was only 30 minutes and did not text her at the end of the day. We do our draft of Best Romantic movies. Bobby opens the mailbag from a listener whose husband’s feelings are hurt that she doesn’t want to change her name to his after they get married.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
